title: Looking for assistance - Teach a Friend mission
body: Looking for someone to assist me with completing the "Teach a Friend" mission, which requires playing a bot/coop match with a level 1-15 player. Anyone who would be willing to assist please send me a friend request for "HeartVine" and "SparksElm".

replies.body:
have u done the mission yet?
i made a fresh acc so a  friend and i could get the icon
the IGN is HideOnScuttle

Haven't got to it yet, so I could still use the help (had a few people friend me, just haven't been online at the same time as them). Will send you a friend request in the morning if you haven't already sent one my way, and hopefully we'll catch each other online soon.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
